item.title: Discounts
item.description: 10% Nonprofit discount For Vermont-based Nonprofit Corporations 501c(3) 5% B Corp discount For Vermont-based Certified B Corps and Benefit Corporations 5% Environmental Impact discount For clients within 20-minute walking distance of downtown Burlington, Vermont Additional discounts You may qualify for additional discounts based on duration of contract (i.e. weekly, monthly) Contact me for details.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Independent Software Consultant / Owner Jack Cary Software Consultant LLC 2018-Present Proven DevOps expert offering cost-effective solutions to organizations of all sizes. Services include business process automation, cloud migration, infrastructure as code, continuous delivery, real-time event processing, and custom web service development. Senior Software Engineer MyWebGrocer, Inc. 2011-2016 (5 years) Accelerated core product installation process from 6 weeks to < 48 hours by leveraging automation and continuous delivery technologies.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Ready to discuss the needs of your project? Send me an email to get started today. jack@jackcary.com

item.title: Services
item.description: Business Process Automation Streamline and accelerate your workflows. Continuous Delivery Faster, better, software releases. Cloud Migration and Orchestration Leverage the power and flexibility of the cloud. RESTful Web Services Open up your data with secure and scalable APIs. Technology Selection Choose the best tool for the job, every time. ETL and Data Migration Move, transform, and repurpose your data.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, World! I’m Jack Cary, a Software Consultant and DevOps expert in Burlington, Vermont. I specialize in Business Process Automation, Cloud Orchestration, Systems Administration, Continuous Delivery, and RESTful Web Service development. I provide cost-effective information technology services and software solutions to businesses of all sizes, ultimately saving valuable time and resources through the power of automation. With over 20 years of real-world experience designing and developing business software, I have the skills and expertise to meet the needs of your project.
